query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS webhook_template_logs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  template_id INT NOT NULL,
  event_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  event_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  event_message TEXT,
  event_data JSON,
  severity ENUM('info', 'warning', 'critical') DEFAULT 'info',
  rendered_title VARCHAR(500),
  rendered_body TEXT,
  request_payload TEXT,
  response_status INT,
  response_body TEXT,
  status ENUM('pending', 'sent', 'failed', 'rate_limited') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  error_message TEXT,
  retry_count INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  next_retry_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_webhook_template_log_template (template_id),
  INDEX idx_webhook_template_log_event (event_type),
  INDEX idx_webhook_template_log_status (status),
  INDEX idx_webhook_template_log_created (created_at)
);
command:

  event_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,

  severity ENUM('info', 'warning', 'critical') DEFAULT 'info',

  response_status INT,
  response_body TEXT,
  status ENUM('pending', 'sent', 'failed', 'rate_limited') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  error_message TEXT,
  retry_count INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  next_retry_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_webhook_template_log_template (template_id),
  INDEX idx_webhook_template_log_event (event_type),
  INDEX idx_webhook_template_log_status (status),
  INDEX idx_webhook_template_log_created (created_at)
);
